title: Mobile-Based Music Technology Utilization for Just-In-Time Learning Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic music theory knowledge and familiarity with smartphone usage
context.additional_context: Popular music education course conducted primarily via smartphones in limited-technology environments; intermediate learners regularly use recording studio facilities but struggle with complex music technology acquisition

learning_goals: Learners will perform basic audio editing and mixing techniques using smartphone apps with at least 85% accuracy.
Learners will resolve at least 70% of technical issues encountered in recording studios by referencing real-time mobile learning materials.
Learners will be able to independently utilize three or more plugins in the DAW (Digital Audio Workstation) mobile interface upon completion of the 4-week course

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
